sentences.en: McCreary lives in a converted schoolhouse outside Charlottesville.
sentences.cn: 麦克里里住在夏洛茨维尔市外一幢校舍改建的小楼里。

sentences.en: They bought an old schoolhouse to live in and built a workshop in the basement.
sentences.cn: 他们买了座旧校舍居住，还在地下室建了个作坊。

sentences.en: Alfred went musing into the deserted schoolhouse.
sentences.cn: 阿尔弗雷德若有所思地走进空寂无人的的校舍。
